summary: New Animals and Fixes is a mod that adds completely new creatures to the game and fixes some of the issues I had with the vanilla animals. DawnGuard and DragonBorn are needed and the latest version of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#980000]THIS MOD IS NO LONGER BEING CONTINUED. I HAVE STARTED A NEW MOD SIMILAR TO THIS. THIS WILL BE ONLY ON SSE THOUGH.[/color]



New Animals and Fixes is a mod that adds completely new creatures to the game and fixes some of the issues I had with the vanilla animals. DawnGuard and DragonBorn are needed and the latest version of skyrim. this mod is no longer being worked on 1.1 is the last update I have started work on a new mod instead of an update for this one.Â 
Also compatible with Skytest.
New animals:
Moose
Megaloceros (Giant ice age elk)
Lynx(snowy and spotted)
Cave lion
Beavers
Raccoons
Giant bears
Dire wolves
red wolves
White Tail deer male+female
Mountain Lion or cougar or puma
Female Caribou
all new creatures have their own loot if one doesn't its on its way
some creatures to come are sabrelynx, cyclopse, yeti, more deer, more trolls and insects.
Fixes:
Named the "deer" Caribou
Distinguished between male and female elk name + removed antlers from the female
Made loot more realistic
Made mammoths and giants taller.
Want a creature or a fix post a comment.

Installation
Download install normally.
Credits:
Thx Skyworm for the videos and Vancover for the images
530gothic25 as the creator of the north american animals.
Gopher for being awesome and creating some of the best mods on the nexus
Brodual for his awesome showcases
MMOxREVEIW for his slightly better show cases
And u the downloader if it wasn't for u, u couldn't be downloading this work of art.
author: opera4ever
